thread.section_title: Aran Sweater Market Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Aran Sweater Market | aransweatermarket.com
thread.title: Tori Porter
thread.title_full: Aran Sweater Market reviewed by Tori Porter

author: Tori Porter
title: Tori Porter
text:
Probably one of the worst customer service encounters I have ever had. No make that the worst. I've complained three times directly by email, numerous times on the live chat and there is still no solution to the fact they sent me wool from different dye lots. Avoid them like the plague! On top of my order having an error the delivery was atrocious both times I bought stuff - awful delivery both in Ireland and UK. And the reason for my second order was because the amount of wool suggested for my size project was incorrect.
Do not touch with a barge pole. It's just a circle of unhelpfulness there!
